entry.title: Severe Weather Statement issued August 10 at 1:27PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...THE SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING FOR NORTHEASTERN LA PAZ COUNTY WILL EXPIRE AT 130 PM MST...
